      Initialize the Bucket Connection pool connection
      Parameters:
      host - the mysql host
      database - the mysql database name
      table - the mysql database table name
      user - the mysql user
      password - the mysql username password
      port - the mysql port
      useSSL - connect to mysql using SSL?
